editions.effect:
This card costs 1 less to activate if you control a Sword weapon.

Prevent the next 3 %attack%combat% damage that would be dealt to target unit this turn.
editions.effect_raw:
This card costs 1 less to activate if you control a Sword weapon.

Prevent the next 3 combat damage that would be dealt to target unit this turn.
editions.effect_html: This card costs 1 less to activate if you control a Sword weapon.Prevent the next 3 attack combat damage that would be dealt to target unit this turn.

editions.flavor: "Ha! Are you even trying to hit me?"

effect:
This card costs 1 less to activate if you control a Sword weapon.

Prevent the next 3 combat damage that would be dealt to target unit this turn.
effect_raw:
This card costs 1 less to activate if you control a Sword weapon.

Prevent the next 3 combat damage that would be dealt to target unit this turn.
flavor: When masterfully used, a sword can deflect any attack with minimal force.
name: Deflecting Edge

result_editions.flavor: "Ha! Are you even trying to hit me?"

rule.description: Deflecting Edge can only prevent combat damage, which is damage dealt by attacks.
The damage prevented does not need to be from one source. E.g. three different sources each dealing 1 combat damage each can all be prevented in the same turn.

effect_html: This card costs 1 less to activate if you control a Sword weapon.Prevent the next 3 combat damage that would be dealt to target unit this turn.

editions.effect:

editions.effect: Cards in graveyards are norm element.

editions.flavor: Some say the ancestral mausoleums of Pendragon are cursed—only traversable with the Corhazi's light.

editions.flavor: With a nose for trash and an eye for treasure, these relentless scavengers will stop at nothing to fill their hoards with trinkets and baubles.

effect: **On Enter:** Banish up to two target cards from a single graveyard.
effect_raw: On Enter: Banish up to two target cards from a single graveyard.
flavor: Looters have conditioned these diligent creatures to scavenge the battlefield for any source of glint or glitter in exchange for a treat.
name: Scavenging Raccoon

result_editions.flavor: With a nose for trash and an eye for treasure, these relentless scavengers will stop at nothing to fill their hoards with trinkets and baubles.

effect_html: On Enter: Banish up to two target cards from a single graveyard.

editions.flavor: "You indolent wretches will be cut down by my ascendant mastery of the blade."

effect: **On Enter:** CARDNAME gets +**X** [POWER] until end of turn where **X** is the amount of allies target opponent controls more than you control.
effect_raw: On Enter: Imperious Highlander gets +X POWER until end of turn where X is the amount of allies target opponent controls more than you control.
flavor: Against all odds and against an insurmountable front, there can be only one answer.
name: Imperious Highlander

result_editions.flavor: "You indolent wretches will be cut down by my ascendant mastery of the blade."

effect_html: On Enter: Imperious Highlander gets +X until end of turn where X is the amount of allies target opponent controls more than you control.

editions.flavor: War cannot be won alone.
Valiant cries fortify wills and strengthen resolves, but have opposite effects in foes.

Allies you control get +1 [POWER] until end of turn. Draw a card into your memory.

editions.flavor: "The emperor is dead! The throne sits empty!"
The duty of delivering time-sensitive parcels is given to the fleet of foot.

effect: **On Attack:** You may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
effect_raw: On Attack: You may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
flavor: “War is upon us. Spread the word!”
name: Hasty Messenger

result_editions.flavor: The duty of delivering time-sensitive parcels is given to the fleet of foot.

effect_html: On Attack: You may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

editions.effect: **On Enter:** Look at the top 1+**LV** cards of your deck. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
editions.effect_raw: On Enter: Look at the top 1+LV cards of your deck. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
editions.flavor: Those cast away by the torrents of fate find shelter in fortunes foretold.
editions.effect_html: On Enter: Look at the top 1+LV cards of your deck. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

effect: **On Enter:** Look at the top 1+**LV** cards of your deck. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. *(**LV** refers to your champion's level.)*
effect_raw: On Enter: Look at the top 1+LV cards of your deck. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. (LV refers to your champion's level.)
flavor: Reading the ebb and flow of the moon's sway grants insight into the currents of fate.
name: Tide Diviner

effect: **On Enter:** Draw seven cards.
effect_raw: On Enter: Draw seven cards.

effect_html: On Enter: Draw seven cards.

effect: **On Enter:** Draw seven cards.
effect_raw: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
name: Morrigan, Lost Spirit
effect_html: On Enter: Draw seven cards.

effect: **On Enter:** Draw six cards then choose two basic elements. CARDNAME gains "**Inherited Effect:** This object is each of the chosen elements in addition to its other elements."
effect_raw: On Enter: Draw six cards then choose two basic elements. Prismatic Spirit gains "Inherited Effect: This object is each of the chosen elements in addition to its other elements."
flavor: A beautiful dance of color and the enmeshment of elements make manifest its prismatic brilliance.
name: Prismatic Spirit
effect_html: On Enter: Draw six cards then choose two basic elements. Prismatic Spirit gains "Inherited Effect: This object is each of the chosen elements in addition to its other elements."

effect: [REST]**:** Put CARDNAME on the bottom of your champion's lineage then choose a class. CARDNAME gains "**Inherited Effect:** This object is the chosen class in addition to its other classes."
effect_raw: REST: Put Gate of Alterity on the bottom of your champion's lineage then choose a class. Gate of Alterity gains "Inherited Effect: This object is the chosen class in addition to its other classes."
flavor: A gate powered by The Grand Archive itself. It grants special privileges to champions that pass through it.
name: Gate of Alterity
effect_html: : Put Gate of Alterity on the bottom of your champion's lineage then choose a class. Gate of Alterity gains "Inherited Effect: This object is the chosen class in addition to its other classes."

editions.flavor: Nothing is powerful enough to break free of destiny's hold, but some blessed artifacts can ease it's grasp.
Nothing is powerful enough to break free of destiny's hold, but some blessed artifacts can ease it's grasp.

effect: **Banish CARDNAME:** Shuffle up to three cards from your hand into your deck, then draw that many cards.
effect_raw: Banish Orb of Regret: Shuffle up to three cards from your hand into your deck, then draw that many cards.
flavor: No being is truly bound to their fate, at least not when the will of the divine can be swayed.
name: Orb of Regret

result_editions.flavor: Nothing is powerful enough to break free of destiny's hold, but some blessed artifacts can ease it's grasp.

The fleeting iridescences that wavers in the orb shows both what could be and what could have been.

rule.description: Once Creative Shock starts to resolve, players can't respond to its effects. If a player wants to respond to the potential 2 damage Creative Shock can deal, it must be responded to before Creative Shock starts resolving (before its controller draws two cards).
